roleset.name: coat with plastic
roleset.note: LAMINATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'laminate' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment. (from laminate.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: A four-page ad from Texas Instruments Inc., running in approximately 140,000 issues of the Oct. 20 ``Corporate Elite'' issue of the McGraw-Hill Inc. publication, contains [a speech synthesizer]-1 laminated [*]-1 between two of the pages.
